about.title: About
about.conferenceDescription:
The International Conference on Mergers and Acquisitions (M&A) in Healthcare 2025 – HIMA 2025, organized by Medicallaw , welcomes the participation of leaders from ministries, government organizations, investment funds, and international experts. The event brings together more than 200 distinguished guests representing healthcare groups, pharmaceutical companies, hospitals, as well as enterprises in biomedical technology, genetic testing, cosmetics, nutrition, and dairy sectors.
HIMA 2025 not only aims to promote legal transparency and standardize M&A procedures in the healthcare sector, but also serves as a platform for sharing IPO implementation processes and effective capital-raising channels, fostering collaboration and sustainable growth within the healthcare ecosystem.
about.medicallawDescription: We are proud to be Vietnam's leading provider of legal and medical consulting services, with experience advising over 200 hospitals nationwide.</br>MedicalLaw Vietnam Legal and Medical Consulting Company Limited offers specialized consulting services including: establishment consultation for medical facilities; licensing consultation for manufacturing and distribution of pharmaceuticals, cosmetics, functional foods, and medical devices; legal advisory for mergers and acquisitions (M&A); and comprehensive legal solutions in the healthcare sector.</br>With our dedicated and experienced team of experts, MedicalLaw consistently delivers complete client satisfaction and trust in every transaction and partnership project.
about.1to1Description:
ONEtoONE Corporate Finance is a leading independent global investment banking firm specializing in M&A advisory services for the middle market.
Founded in 2004, the firm operates in 70+ cities across 30+ countries, with over 200 expert dealmakers and 20 years of experience across 2,000+ mandates.
ONEtoONE delivers end-to-end M&A solutions powered by:
  • A global network seamlessly connecting clients with buyers and investors worldwide.
  • Advanced AI-driven search technology and a proprietary data platform providing real-time transaction visibility.
  • Sector-specialized teams ensuring deep industry expertise and maximum transaction value.
  • A conflict-free model, being 100% employee-owned.
  • Their methodology, technology, and international reach enable ONEtoONE to deliver clarity, precision, and success in every transaction.
